ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Pharaoh said, 'Who then is your Lord, Musa?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He asked: "Who then is that Lord of yours, O Moses?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh said:" Moses! Who is the Lord of the two of you?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh asked them, "Who is your Lord?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Firaun, “So who is the Lord of you both, O Moosa?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Fir`awn said: "Who then, O Musa, is the Lord of you two"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Firon) said: And who is your Lord, O Musa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Pharaoh said, 'Who is your Lord, Moses?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Pharaoh) said: Who then is the Lord of you twain, O Moses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh said, "Who then is the Lord of you both, Moses?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: who is the Lord of you twain, O Musa!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Who is your Lord, Moses?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (When this message was delivered), (Pharaoh) said: "Who, then, O Moses, is the Lord of you two?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "Who then, O Musa (Moses), is the Lord of you two?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Pharaoh) said: 'Moses, who is the Lord of you both'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Who is your Lord, O Moses.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:49] He said, ‘So who is your Lord, O Moses?’ — he [Pharaoh] restricted this [question] to him [Moses], because [between him and Aaron] he is the principal [bearer of God’s Message] and also because of his [Pharaoh’s] having pampered him while he was being reared [as a child].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Pharaoh) said: Who then is the Lord of you twain, O Moses?)
